reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is a bit old and a dated, but rooms are well maintained and very clean. My garden room was comfortable and spacious. Beach next to the hotel is simply spectacular and not crowded. A short ride from the restaurants and clubs. Hotel restaurant was very good. If you look for a comfy bed great location, this is your place.
reviews.title: Enjoable stay, spectacular beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked this hotel through a travel package company using the "romance" package. As far as the resort goes, it was clean and well kept. The shower had decent pressure and was roomy. Though, if long, hot showers are important, I would look elsewhere. The in-room bathroom provided privacy. The bed was comfortable. A little more storage space would have been nice though. We had to keep most of our clothes in our bags as a result. If you are like me and apply make-up daily- the lighting in there was terrible. One side of the mirror was shadowed the whole time. The view from the balcony was partial ocean view. The central air worked well. There is a hot tub on grounds but it is a bit of a walk from the hotel. The map they provided wasn't very clear so we did a bit of exploring before finding it. Valet service was prompt and friendly. The pineapple infused water in the lobby is fantastic. The breakfast buffet had a great variety of fruits, pastries, meats, juices, and breads. The eggs were sub-par but everything else I had was great. The dining area is an open-air sort of thing and birds are constantly in and out. They will jump on your chairs, table, and even eat from your plate. Our first morning there, a bird defecated on our table. They are finch-type birds. The staff was so-so as far as friendliness goes. Some are nicer than others. We came to the conclusion that it was like that all over Maui. One gets the feeling the locals hate the tourists.
reviews.title: Well kept resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our first evening there we had the worst service in the restaurant. Our server (Tyson, I think) was negligent to the point that we waited 20 minutes for our first beverage and had to remind him about it. He brought me the wrong pasta but I ate it anyway because I was so hungry. (My flight had been rerouted an extra two hours then we were caught in traffic (yadda yadda ya). The pesto was under seasoned and the chicken was very dry. I had to keep drinking water to get it down my throat. Needless to say, we did not go back for dinner there. The bartenders were another story. They were attentive, conversational and personable.
reviews.title: A Little Gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: This place is the real deal.
reviews.title: Fairly nice, but parking surprises.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: Lovely rooms, lovely staff, lovely position.
reviews.title: Perfect to relax

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived a few hours before check in, The desk checked us in, but reminded us that we were early and told us to check back in an hour or so. We went to the beach and came back at 2pm and our room was ready. We booked a partial oceanview room and that's what we got. Unlike other reviews, they did not pressure us to take a full oceanview room.
reviews.title: Great resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was very clean and had an island feel. They also had "blackout" sliders which allowed for naps during the day. Beds were pillowtop with 2 different types of pillows. The beach was beautiful, but was very windy. Oddly enough, we found that Lahaina was not nearly as windy. We did snorkel at Black rock, which was great. We saw 2 different turtles on different days. The happy hours were still pricey ($4-5 beers), but we bought beer from the onsite store for half that and drank in our room and by the pool.
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the breakfast buffet and this was standard. Nothing great, but a good hardy meal to start your day. We did see whales breachiing one morning.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We knew of the Luau, but no one at the resort mentioned it to us. To be honest, I hear they sell out everynight and maybe the dont need the hotel guests, Parking was bad even when the luau was not in session, but this wasnt a big deal.
reviews.title: Like going to paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did whale watching in Lahaina and this was great. We saw dozens of whales. The town is also great for shopping and each store has different items. A rental car is a must, as we went to and from Lahaina 2-3x per day.
reviews.title: but the first night was awful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Royal Lahaina on our honeymoon. We had a beautiful room with an ocean view. There was a HUGE breakfast buffet every morning. Everyone was really nice. We plan on going back next year!
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The view from our room was to die for. Hotel was spotless, staff was very friendly. The bathroom is very small. The breakfast buffet is wonderful, it was included with our package, it has something for everybody. My wife was very disappointed, they don't have a spa. I would definitely recommend a rental car. Would definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: Beautiful facility

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012
reviews.text: Myself and husband stayed at this hotel for 10 nights in nov 12 for our honeymoon. We found the staff very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Perfect honeymoon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our cottage room was a little dated but very clean and although our shower didn't work it was fixed before we came back from breakfast which we were really impressed with.
reviews.title: Good hotel, could be even better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We had a buffet breakfast on the 1st morning and was a little shocked at the bill ( worth it for big eaters, a little pricy as for little eaters as I don't believe I ate my money's worth) but we explored along the beach walk and found the "castaway cafe" and a little further away "dukes" both had vey friendly staff and food was excellent.
reviews.title: 50th anniversary trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Stayed at the Royal Lahania for a week Feb 9th till the 16th.
reviews.title: Great Resort with Boutique Hotel Feel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: At check in our requested room was not avaialble as it was very busy, so we were down graded for the night. Our requested room was ready the next day. No sweat, the front desk arranged for our bags to be moved, so we relaxed on the beach and then got our new keys.
reviews.title: Beyond Awesome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are nice, big, pretty modern considering the hotel was built in the 60's. Shower had good pressure and got nice and hot. Bed was comfortable, once we adjusted to the time, it was heaven after a long day of being a tourist.
reviews.title: Great Customer Service!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was great, everyone we met, from Bill & Rebecca at the beach bar to Jordan at the valet stand, everyone was very friendly.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is big enough to be a resort but it has a more comfortable feel to it.
reviews.title: 2012 Nov. Late 40's cpl
